name: claude-config-editor (gagarinyury)
description: [项目级] Claude Config Editor is a lightweight web tool that helps you clean and optimize your Claude Code/Desktop config files (.claude.json). Analyze project sizes, bulk delete chat histories, export data for backup, manage servers visually, and speed up Claude—all locally, with auto-backup, no dependencies, and cross-platform support.。来源: https://github.com/gagarinyury/claude-config-editor

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
![Overview](screenshots/overview.png)
*Quick stats and health analysis at a glance*

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content:
git clone https://github.com/gagarinyury/claude-config-editor.git
cd claude-config-editor
python3 server.py

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
LICENSE
README.md
REDDIT_POST.md
index.html
screenshots
screenshots/mcp-servers.png
screenshots/overview.png
screenshots/project-history.png
server.py
